name: Grouchy, Knife-Wielding Tamoto
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Geo DMG.
Usage(s): 2
While this card is on the field: Physical DMG dealt by your Chiori is converted to Geo DMG, and Geo DMG dealt by Normal Attacks +1.
